name: MedicatieToedieningStatusCodelijst_to_MedicationAdministrationStatusCodes
title: MedicatieToedieningStatusCodelijst to MedicationAdministrationStatusCodes
description: Maps MedicatieToedieningStatus codes as found in Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) MedicationAdministration2 v1.1.1](https://zibs.nl/wiki/MedicationAdministration2-v1.1.1(2020EN)) to `MedicationAdministration.status` codes as found in FHIR R4.
